Title: Lifting up the Afflicted

Verses.1:
The spirit of the Lord, GOD, is upon me,
because the LORD has anointed me
to proclaim good news to the poor.
He has sent me to heal the brokenhearted,
to proclaim liberty for the captives,
and freedom for the prisoners.
Verses.2:
To proclaim the year of the LORD's favor,
and the day of vengeance of our God.
To comfort all who mourn.
Verses.3:
To grant to those mourning in Zion:
to give them a beautiful crown instead of ashes,
the oil of gladness instead of mourning,
the garment of praise instead of a despairing spirit.
So that they will be called oaks of righteousness.
Plantings of the LORD,
destined to display His splendor.
Verses.4:
They will rebuild the ancient ruins.
They will restore places long devastated.
They will revive the ruined cities,
lost to desolation for many generations.
Verses.5:
Strangers will stand and tend your flocks.
Foreigners will work your fields and vineyards.
Verses.6:
But you will be called priests of the LORD.
They will speak of you as ministers of our God.
You will eat the wealth of nations,
and you will boast of their riches.
Verses.7:
Instead of shame, you will have a double portion.
Instead of humiliation, you will rejoice in your portion.
So you will inherit a double portion in your land,
and everlasting joy will be yours.
Verses.8:
For I, the LORD, love justice.
I hate robbery and wrongdoing.
I will faithfully give them their reward,
and make an everlasting covenant with them.
Verses.9:
Their descendants will be known among the nations,
and their offspring in the midst of the peoples.
All who see them will acknowledge
that they are the people the LORD has blessed.
Verses.10:
I will rejoice greatly in the LORD;
my soul will be joyful in my God.
For he has clothed me with garments of salvation,
and wrapped me in a robe of His righteousness.
As a groom adorns a turban.
As a bride adorns herself with jewels.
Verses.11:
For as the earth produces its sprouts,
and a garden causes seeds to grow,
the Lord GOD will cause righteousness and praise
to spring up before all nations.
